pros: Efficient road-to-trail; Well-cushioned; Stable ride; Excellent, secure fit; Very breathable; Great traction; Unexpectedly light; Reasonably priced

RR_verdict: The React Pegasus Trail 4 is one of the top road-to-trail options from Nike that we have ever worn and scrutinized. Cushiony and responsive on the roads yet grippy and stable on the trails, the shoe makes a perfect hybrid. It also remains surprisingly light given all the features packed into it. We are happy that it feels a lot like the original Pegasus Trail 36 but with an enhanced grip.
awards: Top pick in best running shoes for heel strike pattern (2024), Top pick in best running shoes for hiking (2023), Top 18% in Nike running shoes, Top 19% in Nike React running shoes, Top 23% most popular running shoes
